desc: This book constitutes the refereed proceedings of the 11th International Conference on Scalable Uncertainty Management, SUM 2017, which was held in Granada, Spain, in October 2017.

details.authors: Serafín Moral (Editor),‎ Olivier Pivert (Editor),‎ Daniel Sánchez (Editor),‎ Nicolás Marín (Editor)

title: Scalable Uncertainty Management
